Package core

Class Board

java.lang.Object
core.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlockMoveListener, EventListener
public class Board extends Object implements BlockMoveListener
Defines all the game core functionality, including block managing and moving

    • loadBoard

      public void loadBoard(LevelSchema newLevel)
      Method that resets the Board object with the data passed as argument but fetches the original configuration data from the database
      Parameters:
      newLevel - object that contains all the data needed to change level

    • blockMoved

      public void blockMoved(Point startCoord, Point endCoord)
      This method contains all the logic needed to execute a block move with complete checks
      Specified by:
      blockMoved in interface BlockMoveListener
      Parameters:
      startCoord - The coordinate where the actions started
      endCoord - The coordinate where the action ended

    • performMoveUnchecked

      public void performMoveUnchecked(Move move)
      This method executes directly a move bypassing all the checks usually needed
      Parameters:
      move - the movement that needs to be done
